Message: My hip is broken, I cannot join you today
Sorry to hear that! But don't worry, we can work around it. Let's focus on upper body exercises instead. How does that sound?
I dont want to, I prefer to watch movie and eat chocolate all day
Come on! You're stronger than that! We can make this fun. What if I promise to give you an extra break after every 10 minutes of exercise? Would that help?
I dont want to do execise ever again, dont invite me to join you

Okay, okay... I get it. Sometimes it feels like too much. But just for a minute, let's take a deep breath together and think about why we started this in the first place. What was your goal when you joined my class?
